Class: FramePhaser

plugins/ai/phasers/frame-phaser. FramePhaser

new FramePhaser(id, opts)

Construct a phaser that performs a set number of sprite updates per frame. Note that this should not be constructed directly, but rather via the plugin factory method sn.createPhaser('frame-phaser') on the engine.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
id String A unique ID
opts Object <optional>
 An object with assorted options set in it.
phases
How many sprites should be updated on each frame? Must be at least 2.

Methods

addSprite(s)

Adds a sprite to this phaser. The phaser will reschedule the sprites but cannot guarantee the first frame of update the sprite will receive.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
s Object The sprite to add
